basics.name: Tay Wee Leng Kelvin
basics.label: Full Stack Engineer
basics.summary: As a communicative person, I get the most energy out of solving technical challenges with non-technical teammates. I enjoy futsal, 80s music, natto and afternoon beers (not in that order).

work.summary: I'm learning new things everyday as I work on internal-facing applications and tools used by Sales, Finance and Operations team, as well as client-facing applications. I also maintain API clients and style guides and open-source projects for Gengo.
highlights: Self-initiated tools to help manage crons
Gengo Best Employee of the Month (August 2015)
Taught conversational Thai to colleagues as part of knowledge-sharing
tools: Python, PHP, Javascript, PostgreSQL, IronMQ

work.summary: As a new global graduate hire, I worked on the highly-anticipated Age of Empires World Domination mobile game. Besides the API server, i also developed features on the front-end via Unity 3D.
highlights: Self-started 3 usability projects to help improve content management processes
Main contributor to Admin system for Age of Empires development team

work.summary: I served with the elite Singapore Guards as my compulsory military service.
highlights: Served in overseas mission exercises in Thailand and Australia

awards.title: Lee Kuan Yew Gold Medal
awards.summary: Overall top graduate for Electronic Commerce major
